name: FaciPayUI
summary: FaciPayUI provides SwiftUI and UIKit components for FaciPay checkout.
description:
FaciPayUI provides the UI components for FaciPay SDK including:
- FaciPayButton - Pre-styled payment button
- CheckoutSheet - SwiftUI checkout sheet
- CheckoutViewController - UIKit checkout controller
- FaciPayLoadingView - Rive animated loading view
- WebView integration for checkout flow
